ChangeList.Description: Added the **azureAdDeviceId** property to the [windowsAutopilotDeviceIdentity](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/intune-windowsAutopilotDeviceIdentity?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the [deleteDevices](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/intune-windowsAutopilotDeviceIdentity-deleteDevices?view=graph-rest-beta) method to the [windowsAutopilotDeviceIdentity](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/intune-windowsAutopilotDeviceIdentity?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Removed the **orderIdentifier** property from the [windowsAutopilotDeviceIdentity](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/intune-windowsAutopilotDeviceIdentity?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Removed the **orderIdentifier** property from the [importedWindowsAutopilotDeviceIdentity](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/intune-importedWindowsAutopilotDeviceIdentity?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
